about_the_game:
This the FREE version of Lament of Kyoto, an Action Roguelike where you fight waves of Yokai in feudal Japan inspired by Vampire Survivors and Holocure. Along your journey you will find unlikely allies, discover secrets and hidden locations and plenty of weapons to fight your way to victory. Upgrade these weapons by combining your special Esper Powers with the lingering Yokai energy to create even crazier weapons!

Content in this FREE version

  • The Haunted Manor map
  • Minibosses and event waves
  • Three playable characters, each with a unique gameplay style
  • First weapon set + their upgrades
  • Passives to give you even more power
  • Beautiful Japanese aesthetics
  • Music inspired by our favorite Touhou tracks

Our transparent development process

We are constantly working on the base game, and will periodically update this free version to test out features we might want to add and gather feedback from our community. So join our Discord, and help us shape Lament of Kyoto!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680 / AMD HD 7970

short_description: Lament of Kyoto: Prologue, is an Action Rogue-lite with light horror elements. Fight endless waves of horrifying yokai while exploring the haunted remains of feudal japan. Recruit unlikely allies, discover secrets and vanquish powerful bosses to upgrade your weapons and abilities.
